page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: This area lies in the south-west of Derbyshire,on the border with Staffordshire from which it is separated by the River Trent. The river runs through the area in a northerly direction in a flat valley , with hills rising to a height of about 92 metres in the east. This is a farming area,with some extractive industry (gravel) on the river washlands. It is not densely populated,but is in easy reach of such large cities as Derby and Birmingham. The area contains part of the village of Walton on Trent which is about 5 miles south of Burton on Trent and 6 miles north of Lichfield.
